csl_cpIntc.h File Reference

This is the main header file for the CPINTC Module which defines all the data structures and exported API. More...

CSL_CPINTC_Handle CSL_CPINTC_open (Int32 instNum)
 

Detailed Description

This is the main header file for the CPINTC Module which defines all the data structures and exported API.

Function Documentation

CSL_CPINTC_Handle CSL_CPINTC_open ( Int32  instNum)

============================================================================
CSL_CPINTC_open

Description
This API opens the interrupt controller instance. This should always be the first call to the CSL CPINTC Functional layer. The handle which is returned from this call should be passed in all subsequent CSL API's.

Return Value
CSL_CPINTC_HANDLE - Handle to the CPINTC Module
0 - Error.

Pre Condition
None

Post Condition
None

Affects
None.

Example 

     CSL_CPINTC_HANDLE   hnd;
     ...
     hnd = CSL_CPINTC_open (0);    // Opens CPINTC Instance 0
     ...
